name: Overplasma
description:
Overplasma is an  exploratory platformer with focus on challenging but fair combat, where the player has a diverse move set and defense abilities but so do some enemies!

This demo doesn't represent the game's final quality, in game stages/progress order  as it's still under development,  missing features and have temporary assets.

CONTROLS can be REMAPPED in OPTIONS. (Gamepad is supported)
